title: Leading deodorant brands ranked by sales value in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2014
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Sales in million GBP for 3 number of Brands.
The Sales in million GBP is appeared to be the highest at Brand Male Lynx and lowest at Brand Female Dove.
The difference of Sales in million GBP between the highest and lowest Brand is 40.4.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Sales in million GBP for 3 number of Brands.
The Sales in million GBP is highest at Brand Male Lynx and lowest at Brand Female Dove.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Sales in million GBP for 3 number of Brands.
The Sales in million GBP is appeared to be the highest at Brand Male Lynx and lowest at Brand Female Dove.
The difference of Sales in million GBP between the highest and lowest Brand is 40.4.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Brand in the x axis and Sales in million GBP in the y axis.
The Sales in million GBP is highest at Brand Male Lynx and lowest at Brand Female Dove.
Second maximum Sales in million GBP is found at Brand Female Sure.
The highest value at Brand Male Lynx is 1.7x times more than the lowest value at Female Dove.
Considered together, the average Sales in million GBP in all 3 Brands is roughly 76.4.
Summing up the values of all Brands, we get total 229.2.
